L7p:Comment.stringValue: === If you have the need to customize this policy
=== please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability
This policies adds an API Key, an OAuth client_id (copy of API Key) and an OAuth CLient ID as 'master-key' as used with MAG SDK

L7p:value.stringValue: will be overwritten in the case of an error
Check if any api keys were provided to be deleted
// delete oauth client_id (takes effect only if foreign key on oauth_client_key - oauth_client has been deactivated)
Delete API Keys and OAuth clients
Need to check if count is 0 before proceeding
Check if any api keys were provided to be updated or created
generate lifetime for oauth clients used with MAG SDK
will be overwritten in the case of an error
translate status from active to ENABLED for OTK clients
// Assign incoming variables to context variables

L7p:JdbcQuery.L7p:SqlQuery: UPDATE oauth_client SET name = ${name}, type = ${type}, description = ${description}, organization = ${organization}, custom = ${custom} WHERE client_ident = ${client_ident}

INSERT INTO oauth_client (client_ident, name, type, description, organization, registered_by, created, custom) VALUES (${client_ident}, ${name}, ${type}, ${description}, ${organization}, ${registered_by}, ${now.seconds}, ${custom})

INSERT INTO oauth_client_key (client_key, secret, scope, callback, environment, expiration, status, created, created_by, client_ident, client_name, custom) VALUES (${client_key}, ${secret}, ${oauth_scope}, ${oauth_callback}, ${environment}, ${expiration_otk_client}, ${oauth_client_status}, ${now.seconds}, ${registered_by}, ${client_ident}, ${name}, ${custom})

UPDATE portal_apikey SET apikey_secret = ${secret}, status = ${status}, label = ${name}, apis=${apis.results}, modified_by=${modified_by}, value_xml=${value_xml}, updated=${now.seconds}, organization=${organization} WHERE apikey_pk = ${client_ident}

INSERT INTO portal_apikey (apikey_pk, apikey, apikey_secret, status, organization_id, organization, label, created_by, modified_by, created, updated, apis, value_xml) VALUES (${client_ident}, ${client_key}, ${secret}, ${status}, ${organization_id}, ${organization}, ${name}, ${registered_by}, ${modified_by}, ${now.seconds}, ${now.seconds}, ${apis.results}, ${value_xml})

INSERT INTO oauth_client_key (client_key, secret, scope, callback, environment, expiration, status, created, created_by, client_ident, client_name, custom) VALUES (${masterKey.result}, ${masterKey.result}, ${master_key_scope.result}, ${master_key_redirect_uri.result}, ${environment.result}, ${expiration_otk_client_sdk}, ${oauth_client_status}, ${now.seconds}, ${registered_by}, ${client_ident}, ${name}, ${custom})

L7p:value.stringValue: Insert or update API Keys and OAuth clients
Need to check if count is 0 before proceeding

L7p:SqlQuery.stringValue: DELETE FROM oauth_client WHERE client_ident IN (SELECT apikey_pk FROM portal_apikey WHERE updated < ${now.seconds})
